thread.title: BRIEF-Zodiac Aerospace says investigation ZACEM explosion ongoing
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Zodiac Aerospace says investigation ZACEM explosion ongoing | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Zodiac Aerospace says investigation ZACEM explosion ongoing
text:
July 24 Zodiac Aerospace SA :
* Employees able to prepare for restart of production
* Investigation to determine cause of explosion at ZACEM facility, located in Newport, WA is ongoing
* Building structural experts have conducted a review of the building
Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
